summary: Project to publish a Caffeine-hosted website permanently to the internet and connect the custom domain jpdigitalmarketing.net via iFreeDomains DNS.
architectural_notes: Custom domain connection requires DNS records at registrar: A record @ -> 34.160.111.145 and CNAME www -> cname.caffeine.xyz (for jpdigitalmarketing.net via iFreeDomains).
Caffeine draft apps can expire; live/published versions are intended to be permanent.
known_issues: Domain jpdigitalmarketing.net not resolving because DNS not configured/pointing to the Caffeine site yet.
Draft app expiration caused the need to rebuild/redeploy.

existing_features.title: Update the publishing UI copy to clearly explain that the provided draft URL (https://fluffy-magenta-esu-draft.caffeine.xyz/) is a preview link and that using the app’s “Publish Permanently / Publish to Production” action makes the site live permanently (does not expire).

Change the default recommended custom domain throughout the UI from "jpdigitalmarketing.in" to "jpdigitalmarketing.net" (including default input prefill and any example/placeholder text), while still allowing the user to edit it.

Add a "Connect your domain" help section in the provisioning/publishing page that provides the exact DNS records and values needed for iFreeDomains to point jpdigitalmarketing.net to the live site, including expected propagation time.

new_feature_requests.summary: Publish the Caffeine draft site (fluffy-magenta-esu-draft.caffeine.xyz) as a permanent live website
Connect custom domain jpdigitalmarketing.net to the live site by configuring DNS at iFreeDomains

projectName: Make website publish permanent and guide custom domain connection for jpdigitalmarketing.net
